payload.text: You are required to maintain a minimum cash balance in your account. This is to ensure you have sufficient money available to cover costs such as fees and any other payments. Your minimum required balance is $2,000. Please refer to your relevant PDS located in the 'Document Library' for more information.
Your available cash balance is the amount remaining in your account after accounting for the required minimum balance.

Client's are required to maintain a minimum cash balance in their account. This is to ensure they have sufficient money available to cover costs such as fees and any other payments. Their minimum required balance is $2,000. Please refer to the relevant PDS for more information.
